body: We discussed why this didn't /fix/ my issue (, which you said you would look into, @chartjes - but that doesn't, necessarily, close this out.  Going to reopen this; we can link this to any dependent PRs we come across, along the way.  It's still a good upgrade to have, if it works with the latest dependencies.
